title: Kareena Kapoor not part of Karan Johar’s ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’
text: Kareena Kapoor not part of Karan Johar’s ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’ Friday, 23 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) Kareena Kapoor Khan is not doing a special song in Karan Johar's directorial venture "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil". On Location | Ae Dil Hai Mushkil | Ranbir & Aishwarya 00:50 Karan Johar is currently shooting for his next feature Ae Dil Hai Mushkil in Vienna and we hear that the entire cast and crew is very excited about the project. Some enterprising fan even managed to click a picture of Ranbir and Aishwarya shooting for the movie. In these images Ash can be seen... Recent related news Aishwarya Rai Bachchan who recently joined the cast with Ranbir Kapoor were spotted shooting a scene of their upcoming flick Ae Dil Hai Mushkil in Vienna. Now...
